body:
@bcmills 
it's not just about reflection. It impacts function arguments and return values.
My worry is also a bit about keeping packages as compilation units too (separate compilation).

The right refactoring discipline would be to forbid changes in the clients. Manual or automatic. (It would not be possible to do it concurrently anyway)

Also see https://golang.org/src/go/types/object.go?#L17
